resources.string: I am a full stack developer and flutter developer. I have worked with mern stack technologies. I have been working in this field for about 2 years. I have knowledge in ✅ HTML,CSS,JavaScript ✅ React js ✅ Node js ✅ Express js ✅ MongoDB ✅ Php ✅ Mysql ✅ Bootstrap and jquery ✅ Ajax and Axios ✅ c++ ✅ Flutter projects that I created are: ✅ e-commerce web app with mern stack ✅ blog site with PHP ✅ portfolio website ✅ covid 19 app with flutter ✅ quiz app with flutter my GitHub link is: https://github.com/ali123123-alt developeralimirza123@gmail.com ☎ +92-3170068650
